doc.field: Research files, arbitration award, memorandums and correspondence related to cases reviewed by the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) and the Public Employment Relations Board (PERB) (1961-1985); Cosmopolitan club programs and correspondence (1987-1997); Arbitration Decisions L-R (1963-1973); Arbitration Decisions S-Z (1963-1974)
